summary: Even a cynical atheist like me can still admit that there is worth in some aspects of faith and the people who practice it.  Refusing to see it is just as dogmatic as condemning people to hell
title: A Non-Believer's Appreciation of Religion

summary: I’m usually only tangentially interested in the Consumer Electronics Show.  It seems like so much of the stuff there will never reach customers and exists only to raise hype to woo investors.  The year, however, I found myself getting excited for a number of cool gizmos and gadgets that don’t seem too outlandish to be brought to market...
title: My favorite gizmos of CES 2025

summary: Overall it feels like we get less snow here in Bradford than we used to when we first moved in, but if the snowfall averages I’m looking at are correct, in the last few days we’ve gotten more snow (6+ inches) than we usually do for the entire month (4. 9 inches). summary:
Introduction
Following my previous posts about the bloguidien “challenge”, I lost track of it because the past two months have been very busy.  Instead of writing a lot of small posts, I decided to do a “bloguidien rapid fire”, meaning I’ll answer all the short answered questions in one post (only the one I want to respond to of course).  I may do that monthly as a fun thing so I’ll skip any questions from January at this stage...
title: Bloguidien rapidfire - Q4 2024 edition
